## 1. Load the datasets
```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, cache= TRUE}
library(dplyr)
library(Seurat)
library(patchwork)
library(tidyverse)
library(sleepwalk)
library(gridExtra)
library(future)
library(RColorBrewer)

setwd("D:\Michael\git_check\tils")

# Load the datasets
N1data = Read10X(data.dir = "")
N1 = CreateSeuratObject(counts = N1_data, project = "N1")
N1$Sample = "N1"
N1$respond = "Non_Responder"

N2_data = Read10X(data.dir = "")
N2 = CreateSeuratObject(counts = N2_data, project = "N2")
N2$Sample = "N2"
N2$respond = "Non_Responder"

N3_data = Read10X(data.dir = "")
N3 = CreateSeuratObject(counts = N3_data, project = "N3")
N3$Sample = "N3"
N3$respond = "Non_Responder"

N4_data = Read10X(data.dir = "")
N4 = CreateSeuratObject(counts = N4_data, project = "N4")
N4$Sample = "N4"
N4$respond = "Non_Responder"

R1_data = Read10X(data.dir = "")
R1 = CreateSeuratObject(counts = R1_data, project = "R1")
R1$Sample = "R1"
R1$respond = "Responder"

R2_data = Read10X(data.dir = "")
R2 = CreateSeuratObject(counts = R2_data, project = "R2")
R2$Sample = "R2"
R2$respond = "Responder"

R3_data = Read10X(data.dir = "")
R3 = CreateSeuratObject(counts = R3_data, project = "R3")
R3$Sample = "R3"
R3$respond = "Responder"

R4_data = Read10X(data.dir = "")
R4 = CreateSeuratObject(counts = R4_data, project = "R4")
R4$Sample = "R4"
R4$respond = "Responder"

merged_0 = merge(N1, c(N2, N3, N4, R1, R2, R3, R4), add.cell.ids = c("N1", "N2", "N3", "N4", "R1", "R2", "R3", "R4"))
merged_0$Sample = factor(merged_0$Sample, levels = c("N1", "N2", "N3", "N4", "R1", "R2", "R3", "R4"))
merged_0$respond = factor(merged_0$respond, levels=c("Non_Responder", "Responder"))
dim(merged_0)
